page.title: 07RICHARD WILLIAMS JNR.CHOIR
page.content: The {Richard Williiams Choir}are aged from just 7 up to 16.The 40 girls and boys come from in and around Tonyrefail.Many of them are brothers, sisters and cousins.Every Tuesday and Thursday from 5 pm up until 7.30pm we hold rehearsals. We rehearse in a large room next to Mr.Williams's house.He is very strict and does not allow us to talk because he wants us to sing perfectly. We have been to many different countries such as{Czechoslovakia, {Canada, Germany, France and Russia.} Next year we are going to{Switzeland and we are now learning some German songs.When we go to other countries we do not stay in hotels but stay in peoples homes.When visiting choirs come to Tonyrefail they stay in our homes.We like the choir because we learn new songs and meet new friends.
